note:
After 40 years in the tech industry and 50 of music knowledge, I wrote a music blog about new bands with links to the music of the 60s through 90s. Now that I'm done with that, I like to talk about what I'm listening to and hear the same from others.
I also serve my community and use my accumulated knowledge to help not-for-profit organizations.

fields.name: About me
fields.value: I'm a techie and music enthusiast.
